subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Oct. 7 (AP) — For most of their first season under Manager Lou Piniella, the Chicago Cubs reveled in the home atmosphere of Wrigley Field, where fans came in record numbers to join the party.
snippet: CHICAGO, Oct. 7 (AP) — For most of their first season under Manager Lou Piniella, the Chicago Cubs reveled in the home atmosphere of Wrigley Field, where fans came in record numbers to join the party.
